title: Score 20TB of private cloud storage for $389.97 right now
description: Macworld Cloud storage should do more than hold your files — it should protect them. That’s exactly what Internxt was built to do, and right now, new users can grab a lifetime subscription to 20TB of Internxt Cloud Storage for just $389.97 (down from $4,900). No monthly fees. No renewal reminders. Just total control, forever. Internxt is a privacy-first alternative to the usual cloud giants. Everything you store is end-to-end encrypted and broken into smaller pieces for maximum security. Your data isn’t just stored safely — it’s protected by zero-knowledge encryption, meaning only you can access your files. Not even Internxt can peek. And with apps for Windows, Mac, Linux, iOS, Android, and web browsers, you can access your cloud from pretty much any device, anywhere. It’s intuitive, speedy, and includes Post-Quantum Encryption, so your data stays protected even as tech evolves. Whether you’re a small business backing up sensitive documents, a video editor saving huge project files, or just someone with a growing media library, this gives you serious space without the long-term, ongoing subscription drain. Get 20TB of Internxt Cloud Storage for just $389.97 (reg. $4,900) through August 3. Internxt Cloud Storage Lifetime Subscription (20TB)See Deal StackSocial prices subject to change.
excerpt: Protect your files with Internxt’s ultra-private, encrypted 20TB cloud storage — just $389.97 (reg. $4,900) for lifetime access.

html:
Image: StackCommerce

Cloud storage should do more than hold your files — it should protect them. That’s exactly what Internxt was built to do, and right now, new users can grab a lifetime subscription to 20TB of Internxt Cloud Storage for just $389.97 (down from $4,900). No monthly fees. No renewal reminders. Just total control, forever.

Internxt is a privacy-first alternative to the usual cloud giants. Everything you store is end-to-end encrypted and broken into smaller pieces for maximum security. Your data isn’t just stored safely — it’s protected by zero-knowledge encryption, meaning only you can access your files. Not even Internxt can peek.

And with apps for Windows, Mac, Linux, iOS, Android, and web browsers, you can access your cloud from pretty much any device, anywhere. It’s intuitive, speedy, and includes Post-Quantum Encryption, so your data stays protected even as tech evolves.

Whether you’re a small business backing up sensitive documents, a video editor saving huge project files, or just someone with a growing media library, this gives you serious space without the long-term, ongoing subscription drain.

Get 20TB of Internxt Cloud Storage for just $389.97 (reg. $4,900) through August 3.

Internxt Cloud Storage Lifetime Subscription (20TB)See Deal

StackSocial prices subject to change.
